code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import StatCard from'./StatCard';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DashboardSection=_ref=>{let{employees,tasks,onInit}=_ref;useEffect(()=>{onInit&&onInit();},[onInit]);const active=employees.filter(e=>e.status==='Active').length;const pending=tasks.filter(t=>t.status==='Pending').length;const activities=[{icon:'üë§',text:'New employee John Doe added',time:'2 hours ago'},{icon:'üìù',text:'Task "User Authentication" updated',time:'4 hours ago'},{icon:'‚úÖ',text:'Task "Onboarding Process" completed',time:'1 day ago'},{icon:'üè¢',text:'New department "Operations" created',time:'2 days ago'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"dashboardSection",className:"main-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"section-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Dashboard"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stats-grid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StatCard,{value:employees.length,label:"Total Employees",icon:"\uD83D\uDC65"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StatCard,{value:active,label:"Active Employees",icon:"\u2705"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StatCard,{value:tasks.length,label:"Total Tasks",icon:"\uD83D\uDCCB"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StatCard,{value:pending,label:"Pending Tasks",icon:"\u23F3"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card mt-32",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card__body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Recent Activities"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:activities.map((a,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"activity-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"activity-icon",children:a.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"activity-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:a.text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"activity-time",children:a.time})]})]},i))})]})})]});};export default DashboardSection;
